GET:
WITH logged_user AS (
            SELECT
                user_id,
                user_is_admin,
                user_is_inactive
            FROM users u
            JOIN session s ON u.user_id = s.session_user_id
            WHERE (#session-token# IS NOT NULL) AND (s.session_token = #session-token#)
            LIMIT 1
        )

        SELECT 
            ct.catch_type_id as id,
            ct.catch_type_name as name,
            ct.catch_type_image_filename as img_filename
        FROM
            logged_user lu,
            catch_type ct
        WHERE
            (lu.user_is_inactive = false)
        GROUP BY
            ct.catch_type_id
        ORDER BY
            ct.catch_type_id
